naslov: KUĆA + ZEMLJIŠTE 2554 M2 (63eur/m2!) POKRAJ KUPALIŠTA NA MREŽNICI! (prodaja)
opis: KUĆA + ZEMLJIŠTE 2554 M2 (63eur/m2!) POKRAJ KUPALIŠTA NA MREŽNICI! Prodaje se kuća 40 m2 s velikom okućnicom 2554 m2 na odličnoj lokaciji: odmah pokraj poznatog kupališta "Bosiljčev Mlin", 4 minute vožnje od Kampa Slapić, isto toliko od centra Duga Rese, 20 m od autobusne stanice, 170 m od rijeke Mrežnice te samo 69 km do Trga Bana Jelačića. Kuća je prizemnica 8mx5m, u osnovi jednosoban stan, a sastoji se od: velike sobe, hodnika, kupaonice i kuhinje. Ima sve priključke: gradski vodovod, struju i telefonski priključak. Kuća ima novi krov, novu fasadu i toplinsku izolaciju, novu drvenu nadstrešnicu, natkrivenu terasu koju je moguće urediti po želji te prostran tavan koji se može koristiti u razne svrhe. Kompletna parcela je unutar građevinske zone gdje je dozvoljeno 30% izgrađenosti parcele. Okućnica od 2554 m2 je parcelirana u 2 građevinske parcele i 2 dvorišta te ima put koji vodi do svake parcele. Kuća nema tereta, sve je legalizirano, ima rješenje o izvedenom stanju, vlasništvo 1/1. Energetski certifikat ne treba jer se radi o samostojećoj zgradi korisne površine manje od 50 m2. Napomena: U cijeni od 176010 EUR - udio kuće je 10000 EUR, a cijene m2 zemljišta iznosi 63 EUR! Sve se prodaje isključivo zajedno. … HOUSE + LAND 2554 M2 (63eur/m2!) NEAR THE SWIMMING POOL ON THE MREŽNICA! A house of 40 m2 with a large garden of 2554 m2 is for sale in an excellent location: right next to the famous "Bosiljčev Mlin" swimming pool, 4 minutes' drive from Kampa Slapić, the same distance from the center of Duga Resa, 20 m from the bus station, 170 m from the river Mrežnica and only 69 km to Ban Jelačić Square. The house is a ground floor 8mx5m, basically a one-room apartment, and consists of: a large room, a hallway, a bathroom and a kitchen. It has all connections: city water supply, electricity and telephone connection. The house has a new roof, a new facade and thermal insulation, a new wooden canopy, a covered terrace that can be arranged as desired, and a spacious attic that can be used for various purposes. The complete plot is within the construction zone, where 30% of the plot is built. The yard of 2554 m2 is divided into 2 building plots and 2 yards and has a road leading to each plot. The house has no encumbrances, everything is legalized, it has a certificate of completion, ownership 1/1. An energy certificate is not needed because it is a detached building with a usable area of less than 50 m2. Note: In the price of 176010 EUR - the share of the house is 10000 EUR, and the price of m2 of land is 63 EUR! Everything is sold exclusively together.
adresa_agencije: Adresa:Kneza Branimira 29, 10000 Zagreb, Grad Zagreb, Hrvatska
